articles.title: Joe Burrow grapples with 'football mortality' as wrist recovers - ESPN
articles.description: Joe Burrow spoke about the mental strains surrounding his recovery from the December wrist injury that sidelined him for the rest of the 2023 season.
articles.content:
CINCINNATI -- Joe Burrow remained excited for the challenge of coming back from a wrist injury that ended his 2023 season.
But as the injuries accumulate in his career, the fifth-year Cincinnati Ben… [+3591 chars]
